timeline.bodyText: I've fixed this issue in CrowdIn

replies.bodyText:
Thank you. I've checked the values, and added 2 translations in the following pages.
Delete note
https://crowdin.com/translate/ankidroid/all/en-ja?filter=basic&value=3#6534946
Bury note
https://crowdin.com/translate/ankidroid/all/en-ja?filter=basic&value=3#6534952
Thanks to your help, they're consistent now. I've ensured it.
